author: Equisuz

review: We only stream movies and films, so instead of a flat screen TV, we opted to get a projector. Until recently we would plug our laptop or iOS device directly into the projector. This was a hassle because 1) you can't charge the iOS while it's streaming so you have to hope the battery's full or swap out the iPhone/iPad mid-show, and 2) HBO blocks the connection between an iOS & a projector, so if we wanted to watch HBOgo on the big screen, we'd have to reorganize the cables and connect a laptop.When FireTV announced the HBO parntership, I was psyched. Guess what -- even with the HDMI to VGA converter with R/L Audio Converter, the Fire TV will not work with a projector. So we got the AppleTV. It's not only compatible with our projector (using the converter we bought on Amazon), we found out we could stream HBOgo through our iOS wirelessly, which means it can be plugged into a power cable across the room. Perfect!
author: solara

review: It's an Apple product so what's not to love? So far I haven't had any problems with this. I've been able to watch movies downloaded onto my computer via iTunes seamlessly. I think it works great! I have not used it yet to stream movies from Netflix or anything like that yet.
author: ShirleyRN

review: We have 8 of these now and they keep getting better. When used in conjunction with the Apple Airport Express wireless home wifi router you can easily mirror the screen on you mac compute, iPad, iPod, or iPhone. Its easy and just like Apple products "It just works", no geek needed.The Apple TV give you access to your entire media library as well as capacity to purchase or rent newer movies from the iTunes store, watch your netflix, and many other apps. We like the screensaver that shows a slideshow of your photo stream pics when it goes into sleep mode. It never gets old to see your kids in larger than life random slide show on your HD flat screen. Great product, Great value, Recommended X 100
author: S. Hart "S. Hart"
